mapper.select: select* from( (select lgno, m.mno, m.nick, do, io, act, url, cdt from mv_log l inner join mv_memb m on l.mno=m.mno where m.mno=#{mno} and do='mp' limit 10) union all (select lgno, m.mno, m.nick, do, io, act, url, cdt from mv_log l inner join mv_memb m on l.mno=m.mno where m.mno=#{mno} and do='dp' limit 10) union all (select lgno, m.mno, m.nick, do, io, act, url, cdt from mv_log l inner join mv_memb m on l.mno=m.mno where m.mno=#{mno} and do='sr' limit 10) union all (select lgno, m.mno, m.nick, do, io, act, url, cdt from mv_log l inner join mv_memb m on l.mno=m.mno where m.mno=#{mno} and do='pc' limit 10) union all (select lgno, m.mno, m.nick, do, io, act, url, cdt from mv_log l inner join mv_memb m on l.mno=m.mno where m.mno=#{mno} and do='sc' limit 10) union all (select lgno, m.mno, m.nick, do, io, act, url, cdt from mv_log l inner join mv_memb m on l.mno=m.mno where m.mno=#{mno} and do='fr' limit 10)) as content
mapper.insert: insert into mv_log(mno, do, io, act, url, cdt) values(#{mno}, #{direct}, #{indirect}, #{act}, #{url}, now())
